text:
I am using Tomcat 4.0.3 with IIS 5.0 webserver on Windows 2000 Server. I am 
running tomcat as an NT Service. 
When i stop tomcat service using the Component Services window, the tomcat 
service stops but the destroy method of the servlet is not called but instead 
if i run the shutdown command file of tomcat from dos window then it calls the 
destroy method of the servlet.
I would like to know if there is any fix for this already.

Thanks
Venkat

You can notice in the log files that Catalina is properly shut down. If the
shutdown command fails and times out (which can happen with 4.0.x, but will not
in the upcoming 4.1.x milestone), then Windows will just kill the process.
